alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 4:42PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Sanpete...northeastern Millard and southeastern Juab Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 442 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 42 miles south of Fish Springs Wildlife Refuge to 11 miles east of Delta to near Scipio. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Delta, Scipio, Wales, Fayette, Levan, Hinckley, Oak City, Leamington, Lynndyl, Abraham, Yuba Lake State Park, Little Sahara State Park, Sutherland, Sugarville and Mills. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 179 and 219. US Route 6 between mile markers 58 and 121. US Route 50 between mile markers 90 and 101, and between mile markers 130 and 143. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley; Western Millard and Juab Counties
